scripts.heroku-postbuild: (NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false); (npm install --prefix ./Client-ECommerce && npm run build ./Client-ECommerce); (npm install --prefix ./Admin-ECommerce && npm run build ./Admin-ECommerce)
scripts.railway-build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && CI=false && npm install --omit=dev && cd Client-ECommerce && npm install --omit=dev && npm run build && cd .. && cd Admin-ECommerce && npm install --omit=dev && npm run build
scripts.production-build: npm install --omit=dev && cd Client-ECommerce && npm install --omit=dev && npm run build && cd .. && cd Admin-ECommerce && npm install --omit=dev && npm run build
